typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Sales_Month as date,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Sales_Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Species_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Month
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetRelational

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		type as string,
		properties as (Asset_Id as string, Fund_Id as string, OBJECTID as string, Property as string, Crop_Type as string, Plant_Year as string, State as string, Area_Ha as double, SHAPE_Leng as double, SHAPE_Area as double),
		geometry as (type as string, coordinates as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	backslashEscape: true) ~> geojsonmodified
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = asset_id,
		Fund_ID = fund_id,
		Loc_Json = loc_json
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
geojsonmodified derive({_corrupt_record} = toString(byName('_corrupt_record')),
		asset_id = properties.Asset_Id,
		fund_id = properties.Fund_Id,
		loc_json = geometry.coordinates) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted2 filter(not(isNull(asset_id))) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		loc_geometry as binary,
		loc_json as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		asset_id = Asset_ID,
		fund_id = Fund_ID,
		loc_json = Loc_Json
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT FROM (
 SELECT DISTINCT Source_File FROM 
 audit.OPS_Answers_Error 
 WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
)x
